name: lionel Messi
info: Lionel Andrés Messi is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a forward and captains both Spanish club Barcelona and the Argentina national team

name: Antoine Griezmann
info: Antoine Griezmann is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Spanish club Barcelona and the France national team.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo
info: Cristiano Ronaldo dos Santos Aveiro GOIH ComM is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for  A club Juventus and captains the Portugal national team

name: Erling Braut Haaland
info: Erling Braut Haaland is a Norwegian professional footballer who plays as a striker for Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund and the Norway national team. A prolific goalscorer.

name: Kevin De Bruyne
info: Kevin De Bruyne is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Premier League club Manchester City, where he is vice-captain.

name: Kurt Zouma
info: Kurt Happy Zouma is a French professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Chelsea and the France national team.

name: Kylian Mbappe
info: Kylian Mbappé Lottin is a French professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain and the France national team.

name: Luis Suárez
info: Luis Alberto Suárez Díaz is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a striker for Spanish club Atlético Madrid and the Uruguay national team.

name: Mohamed Salah
info: Mohamed Salah Hamed Mahrous Ghaly is an Egyptian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Premier League club Liverpool and captains the Egypt national.

name: Neymar
info: Neymar da Silva Santos Júnior, known as Neymar, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germai.

name: Robert Lewandowski
info: Robert Lewandowski is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a striker for Bundesliga club Bayern Munich and is the captain of the Poland national team.

name: Sadio Mane
info: Sadio Mané is a Senegalese professional footballer who plays as a winger for Premier League club Liverpool and the Senegal national team.

name: Sergio Agüero
info: Sergio Leonel Agüero del Castillo, also known as Kun Agüero, is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a striker for Premier League club Manches

name: Virgil van
info: Virgil van Dijk is a Dutch professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Premier League club Liverpool and captains the Netherlands national team.

name: Yassine Bounou
info: Yassine Bounou, also known as Bono, is a Moroccan professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for La Liga club Sevilla and the Morocco national team.
